Shaktidoot Scheme.details: Launched by the Government of Gujarat in 2006, the Shaktidoot Scheme aims to support talented sportspersons in achieving excellence at national and international levels by providing them with resources and financial assistance.
benefits: Financial assistance for training and participation in national and international sports events
Access to specialized coaching and sports infrastructure
eligibility: Meeting specified age and achievement criteria

Women's Cash Prize Scheme 2024-25.details: Announced by the Sports Authority of Gujarat, this scheme aims to encourage female athletes across the state by providing cash prizes for their achievements in various sports disciplines.
benefits: Cash prizes for outstanding performance in sports events
eligibility: Participation and achievement in recognized sports events

Khelo India Scheme.details: Under the Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports, the Khelo India Scheme aims to strengthen the sports ecosystem in India. Gujarat has been a significant beneficiary, receiving substantial funding for sports infrastructure projects.
benefits: Development and upgradation of sports infrastructure
Support for athletes through training and coaching programs
eligibility: Sports organizations and institutions in Gujarat
Athletes and sportspersons meeting specified criteria

Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Sports Enclave.details: An under-construction sports enclave in Ahmedabad, Gujarat, named after Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel. Once completed, it will be one of the largest sports complexes in India, aiming to host major sporting events, including the Olympics.
benefits: Promotion of sports tourism in Gujarat
eligibility: Athletes and teams participating in events hosted at the enclave
application_process: Event organizers to coordinate with the Sports Authority of Gujarat

Kankaria Carnival.details: An annual cultural festival celebrated in Ahmedabad, Gujarat, since 2008. The carnival features a broad spectrum of activities, including cultural programs, art exhibitions, amusement rides, and social initiatives.
benefits: Platform for local artists and performers
Boost to local tourism and economy
application_process: Apply through the Ahmedabad Municipal Corporation

Jal Utsav.details: An annual cultural and environmental festival held at Het Ni Haveli, Dudhala, Amreli district, Gujarat. The festival focuses on water conservation and sustainable practices, featuring water sports, cultural performances, and educational workshops.
benefits: Platform for cultural exchange and performances
application_process: Apply through the official festival portal

Vaacha: Museum of Voice.details: A community-led museum located in Tejgadh, Gujarat, focusing on preserving and showcasing the voices, languages, and cultures of tribal communities in the region.
benefits: Preservation of tribal languages and cultures
eligibility: Researchers and students interested in tribal studies
Members of tribal communities in Gujarat
application_process: Contact the Adivasi Academy in Tejgadh
Submit research proposals or participation requests
